get.summary: Returns a list of all boats

500.description: If there is an internal server error.

post.summary: Creates a new Boat by sending a Boat object
post.description:
Sample request:

POST /boat

{  

    "id": int,                      // id of the Boat 
       
    "name": string,                 // name of the boat
        
    "class": string,                // in what class boat competes
    
    "sailNimber": string,           // Sail number
    
    "skipper": string,              // name of the skipper
    
    "ratingId": int,                // id of the Rating
    
    "rating": {                     // can be one rating per boat 
    
        "id": int,                  // id of the Rating
        
        "baseRating": int,          // rating of the boat
        
        "spinnakerAdjustment": int, // spinnaker adjustment configurations
        
        "adjustment": int,          
        
        "currentRating": int,       // current rating
        
        "boats": [ Boat ]           // can be many Boats
        
    },
    
    "tracks": [ Track ],            // can be many Tracks. Please refer to POST Track
    
    "races": [ Race ]               // can be many Races. Please refer to POST Race

}

400.description: If any of the required fields are missing or invalid.

500.description: If there is an internal server error.
If there is an internal server error.

put.description:
Sample request:

PUT /boat/{id}

{  

    "id": int,                      // id of the Boat
       
    "name": string,                 // name of the boat
        
    "class": string,                // in what class boat competes
    
    "sailNimber": string,           // Sail number
    
    "skipper": string,              // name of the skipper
    
    "ratingId": int,                // id of the Rating
    
    "rating": {                     // can be one rating per boat 
    
        "id": int,                  // id of the Rating
        
        "baseRating": int,          // rating of the boat
        
        "spinnakerAdjustment": int, // spinnaker adjustment configurations
        
        "adjustment": int,          
        
        "currentRating": int,       // current rating
        
        "boats": [ Boat ]           // can be many Boats
        
    },
    
    "tracks": [ Track ],            // can be many Tracks. Please refer to POST Track
    
    "races": [ Race ]               // can be many Races. Please refer to POST Race

}

400.description: If any of the required fields are missing or invalid.

500.description: If there is an internal server error.

post.summary: Creates a new Course by sending a Course object with CourseMarks
post.description:
Sample request:

POST /course

{  

    "id": int,                      // id of the course
    
    "name": string,                 // Name of the course
    
    "description": string,          // Some notes about the course
    
    "courseMarks": [                // can be many CourseMarks
       
        {
        
            "id": int,              // id of the courseMark
            
            "latitude": float,      // latitude of the courseMark
            
            "longitude": float,     // longitude of the courseMark
            
            "description": string,  // some info about the courseMark
            
            "rounding": boolean,    // true if Sailers need to go clockwise around the courseMark and false is counter-clockwise (port for counter-clockwise, starboard for clockwise)
            
            "isStartLine": boolean, // true id the courseMark is one of the points of start line
            
            "gateId": id,           // a reference to another CourseMark that makes up a gate, if not gate - skip
            
            "courseId": int         // id of the Course the courseMark belongs to (omit this line, since MySql detects it)
            
        }]
        
}

400.description: If any of the required fields are missing or invalid.

500.description: If there is an internal server error.

get.summary: Returns a list of all courses and courseMarks

200.description: list of all courses returned successfully.

500.description: If there is an internal server error.
If there is an internal server error.
If there is an internal server error.

put.summary: Updates a Course by sending a Course object with CourseMarks
put.description:
Sample request:

PUT /course/{id}

{  

    "id": int,                      // id of the course
    
    "name": string,                 // Name of the course
    
    "description": string,          // Some notes about the course
    
    "courseMarks": [                // can be many CourseMarks
       
        {
        
            "id": int,              // id of the courseMark
            
            "latitude": float,      // latitude of the courseMark
            
            "longitude": float,     // longitude of the courseMark
            
            "description": string,  // some info about the courseMark
            
            "rounding": boolean,    // true if Sailers need to go clockwise around the courseMark and false is counter-clockwise (port for counter-clockwise, starboard for clockwise)
            
            "isStartLine": boolean, // true id the courseMark is one of the points of start line
            
            "gateId": id,           // a reference to another CourseMark that makes up a gate, if not gate - skip
            
            "courseId": int         // id of the Course the courseMark belongs to (omit this line, since MySql detects it)
            
        }]
        
}

500.description: If there is an internal server error.

get.summary: Returns a list of courseMarks from a specific course

post.summary: Creates CourseMarks for a specific Course
post.description:
Sample request:

POST /marks

{  
        
    "id": int,              // id of the courseMark
            
    "latitude": float,      // latitude of the courseMark
            
    "longitude": float,     // longitude of the courseMark
            
    "description": string,  // some info about the courseMark
            
    "rounding": boolean,    // true if Sailers need to go clockwise around the courseMark and false is counter-clockwise (port for counter-clockwise, starboard for clockwise)
            
    "isStartLine": boolean, // true id the courseMark is one of the points of start line
            
    "gateId": id,           // a reference to another CourseMark that makes up a gate, if not gate - skip
            
    "courseId": int         // id of the Course the courseMark belongs to (omit this line, since MySql detects it)
    
}

400.description: If any of the required fields are missing or invalid.

500.description: If there is an internal server error.

put.summary: Updates CourseMarks for a specific Course
put.description:
Sample request:

PUT /marks/{id}

{  
        
    "id": int,              // id of the courseMark

    "description": string,  // some info about the courseMark
            
    "rounding": boolean,    // true if Sailers need to go clockwise around the courseMark and false is counter-clockwise (port for counter-clockwise, starboard for clockwise)
            
    "isStartLine": boolean, // true id the courseMark is one of the points of start line
            
    "gateId": id,           // a reference to another CourseMark that makes up a gate, if not gate - skip
            
    "courseId": int         // id of the Course the courseMark belongs to (omit this line, since MySql detects it)
    
}

400.description: If any of the required fields are missing or invalid.

500.description: If there is an internal server error.

post.summary: Creates a new Race by sending a Race object
post.description:
Sample request:

POST /race

{  

    "id": int,                  // id of the race
    
    "startTime": dateTime,      // UTC start time of the race
    
    "endTime": dateTime,        // UTC end time of the race
    
    "name": string,              // Name of the race
    
    "participants": [ Boat ],    // can be many Boats. Please refer to POST Boat
    
    "courses": [ Course ],       // can be many Courses. Please refer to POST Course
    
    "tracks": [ Track ],         // can be many Tracks. Please refer to POST Track
    
    "regattaId": int            // id of the Regatta the race belongs to
    
}

400.description: If any of the required fields are missing or invalid.

500.description: If there is an internal server error.

get.summary: Returns a list of all races

200.description: list of all races returned successfully.

500.description: If there is an internal server error.
If there is an internal server error.
If there is an internal server error.

post.description:
Sample request:

POST /track

{  

    "id": int,                  // id of the track
    
    "boatId": int,              // id of the boat track belongs to
    
    "raceId": int,              // id of the race the boat was tracked
    
    "started": dateTime,        // UTC start time of the race 
    
    "finished": dateTime,       // UTC end time of the race
    
    "distance": float,          // distance covered by the boat
    
    "gpxData": string,          // XML file from the GPS tracker
    
    "currentRating": int        // current rating of the boat
    
}

400.description: If any of the required fields are missing or invalid.

500.description: If there is an internal server error.
